title: Riot Please Read
body:
Dear Riot

Alright so I got an email from you guys and I was super excited. I get to be a beta tester, sweet! I didn't read the whole thing and hit sign up. I assumed it was for android and iOS because maybe there were just more people on android so you named the email android friends app. I clicked sign up and it brought me to the google play store. I was thinking well maybe I can download stuff from the Google Play Store on my iPhone. Nope. I hit sign up and realized how stupid I was. I really wanted to test for you guys and Im really sorry! Just wanted you guys to know I didnt just sign up and not give feedback. Thanks!

Ryman

replies.body:
Don't worry, we won't hold it against you. 
We'll see you later when the app comes out for both platforms! :D
